title: Beware The Tippling Point, And Other Cocktail Party Tips
teaser: It's the season of holiday cocktail parties and Dan Pashman of the Sporkful podcast has tips for how to be a good guest and host. For instance, if you want to enjoy drinks and appetizers, buddy up.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
